# ClawPilot - LLM Context

> ClawPilot is the easiest way to install and manage OpenClaw, an open-source personal AI assistant that works inside WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Signal, and iMessage.

## About

ClawPilot helps users set up OpenClaw in under 60 seconds. OpenClaw is a self-hosted AI assistant that runs locally on your machine and responds through popular messaging apps.

## Key Features

- **Local or Cloud Hosting**: Run OpenClaw on your own machine for complete privacy, or use ClawPilot's guided cloud hosting option.
- **Multi-Platform Support**: Works with WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Signal, iMessage, and Teams.
- **Privacy-First**: Your data never leaves your machine when self-hosting. Pairing and allowlists keep access controlled.
- **Open Source**: OpenClaw is MIT licensed and community-built.
